text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea almon (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Light Red Meranti, Philippine Mahogany, or White Lauan) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Borneo and the Philippines.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea almon". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33100A9755346. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33100A9755346.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
